events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection on May 9th around 6 PM.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident following the keywords in the initial report including vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the case and will be contacting the claimant shortly to begin the process.
The customer received confirmation that their claim has been received and the investigation will start soon.
Request sent to the customer for photos of the damaged vehicle and police report to support the claim.
Customer submitted photographs of the car damages and a copy of the police report to complete the initial documentation.
Investigation into the accident details and vehicle damage condition has officially started.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident circumstances and liability for the vehicle damage claimed.
A settlement amount has been proposed to the claimant covering the estimated repair costs for the damaged vehicle.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed appreciation for the quick resolution.
The claim has been officially approved based on the investigation and settlement agreement.
Payment covering the vehicle repair costs was issued to the claimantâ€™s account as per the approved settlement.
The claim was closed after confirming the claimant received the payment and all procedures were completed.
The claim documentation was archived for record keeping and future reference in accordance with company policy.
